attributes.action: MAKE RECYCLING EASY BEFORE INTRODUCING PENALTIES
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It should be made easy for people to recycle, local authorities should be made to take everything that can be recycled, manufacturers and supermarkets should be made to ensure that packaging etc can be recylced, goverment need to make it so easy to recycle that those who just can't be bothered will have no excuse and be justified in being charged.
